notice.ch: 醫學工程與資訊科學組

department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

remark.ch: 醫學工程與資訊科學組

goal.ch: 訊號與系統 (Signals and Systems)是一個具有高度運用價值的基礎學科，它的應用層面非常廣，在理工課程當中為相當實用的理論型學科，亦在分析生物系統上扮演至關緊要的角色，但是學習的時候常常因為缺乏真正直接的物理對應圖像，所以具有一定程度的抽象特質。本門課著重介紹數位(digital)與類比(analog)訊號的基本處理技巧，並整合連續時間與離散時間的訊號和系統的概念，透過傅立葉轉換計算時域和頻域之間的數學關係，研究數位與類比系統的濾波(filtering)器設計原理、數位取樣(sampling)原理、與生醫訊號間跨頻域調制(modulation)方法以及心電訊號、腦波、血壓波、與肌電圖等常見生醫訊號處理技巧。
goal.en: 訊號與系統 (Signals and Systems)是一個具有高度運用價值的基礎學科，它的應用層面非常廣，在理工課程當中為相當實用的理論型學科，亦在分析生物系統上扮演至關緊要的角色，但是學習的時候常常因為缺乏真正直接的物理對應圖像，所以具有一定程度的抽象特質。本門課著重介紹數位(digital)與類比(analog)訊號的基本處理技巧，並整合連續時間與離散時間的訊號和系統的概念，透過傅立葉轉換計算時域和頻域之間的數學關係，研究數位與類比系統的濾波(filtering)器設計原理、數位取樣(sampling)原理、與生醫訊號間跨頻域調制(modulation)方法以及心電訊號、腦波、血壓波、與肌電圖等常見生醫訊號處理技巧。

outline.ch:
Week 1: Introduction to signals and systems
Week 2: System properties in time domain
Week 3: Impulse response and convolution
Week 4: Impulse response and convolution
Week 5: Fourier series expansion
Week 6: Fourier series expansion
Week 7: Continuous Fourier transform
Week 8: Continuous Fourier transform
Week 9: Discrete Fourier transform
Week 10:sampling
Week 11:Time and frequency characterization of signals and systems
Week 12: Time and frequency characterization of signals and systems
Week 13: Introduction to time frequency representation
Week 14: Gabor Transform and Wavelet Transform
Week 15: Gabor Transform and Wavelet Transform
Week 16: Phase reassignment
Week 17: Phase reassignment
Week 18: Hilbert Huang Transform
outline.en:
Week 1: Introduction to signals and systems
Week 2: System properties in time domain
Week 3: Impulse response and convolution
Week 4: Impulse response and convolution
Week 5: Fourier series expansion
Week 6: Fourier series expansion
Week 7: Continuous Fourier transform
Week 8: Continuous Fourier transform
Week 9: Discrete Fourier transform
Week 10:sampling
Week 11:Time and frequency characterization of signals and systems
Week 12: Time and frequency characterization of signals and systems
Week 13: Introduction to time frequency representation
Week 14: Gabor Transform and Wavelet Transform
Week 15: Gabor Transform and Wavelet Transform
Week 16: Phase reassignment
Week 17: Phase reassignment
Week 18: Hilbert Huang Transform

textbook.ch:
1.Signals and Systems, by Simon Haykin
Time Frequency Analysis: Theory and Applications,by Leon Cohen
textbook.en:
1.Signals and Systems, by Simon Haykin
Time Frequency Analysis: Theory and Applications,by Leon Cohen

ch.competencies: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習

en.competencies: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
